field.name: id
field.description: automatically generated internal id, only for internal use.

entity.name: Identifiable
entity.description: This interface assigns an automatic 'id', globally unique identifier 'identifier' field, and possibly not unique 'name' to all entities that implement it.

field.name: Identifier
field.description: user supplied or automatically assigned (using a decorator) unique and short identifier, e.g. MA1234

field.name: Name
field.description: human readible name, not necessary unique.

entity.name: MolgenisEntity
entity.description: Referenceable catalog of entity names, menus, forms and plugins.

entity.name: MolgenisFile
entity.description: Helper entity to deal with files. Has a decorator to regulate storage and coupling to an Entity. Do not make abstract because of subtyping. This means the names of the subclasses will be used to distinguish MolgenisFiles and place them in the correct folders.

field.name: Extension
field.description: The file extension. This will be mapped to MIME type at runtime. For example, a type 'png' will be served out as 'image/png'.

unique.description: Name is unique within its type

field.name: activationCode
field.description: Used as alternative authentication mechanism to verify user email and/or if user has lost password.

field.name: active
field.description: Boolean to indicate if this account can be used to login
